attributes.action: change the rules so all assessments are carried out by doctor or specialist
attributes.background: as a disabled person or ill person it is degrading to have to sit in a room with an unqualified medical person, in any of the conditions you may suffer. a qualified doctor with proper knowledge would give a true account of the illness's or conditions.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand you're concerned about the way assessments are carried out but we're not exactly sure which assessments you are referring to.
 
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
